name: Climb and Fall Dice Adventure
summary: Get ready for a thrilling new take on the classic "Snake and Ladder" game with "Climb and Fall: A Dice Adventure"! With intuitive controls and easy-to-learn rules, this exciting game is perfect for players of all ages and skill levels. Roll the dice and climb your way to the top, but be careful of the pitfalls and obstacles that lie in your path. Will you be able to outwit your opponents and emerge victorious?
